metadata.title: Mr. Collins, Mr. Collins

xml.lyrics:
Da-da, uh!
(Mr. Collins?)
Girls please!
(Mr. Collins, Mr. Collins?)
(Please Mr. Collins!)
(Don't play so loud, Mr. Collins!)
What?
What'd you say?
(Mr. Collins?)
(Mr. Collins, Mr. Collins?)
(Please, Mr. Collins!)
(Don't play that loud, Mr. Collins!)
Hey!
Hey!
Hey!
(Mr. Collins?)
(Mr. Collins, Mr. Collins?)
(Please, Mr. Collins)
(Hey, Mr. Collins!)
Hey!
Hey!
